name: The Astronaut and The Star {WIP}
description:
You are a lone Astronaut in you ship, traveling through space. Suddenly something strikes your ship! You find a star that is just as lonely as you. Perhaps you can become friends...

How to play:

Use Arrow keys or WASD to move

To interact with something, walk into it

Press any key to move the dialog along. 

This game was originally made for MadDevil57--->https://maddevil57.itch.io/ for the Secret Santa game jam! It is not done yet, kinda ran out of time but I hope you enjoy it anyway!!
